subsection_content:
The exact cause of endocrine pancreatic tumors is still unclear. Insulinoma occurs when endocrine cells in the pancreas that make insulin begin to grow uncontrollably.
Maintaining proper exercise and nutrition helps improve health and prevent endocrine tumors
Scientists believe that endocrine pancreatic tumors may be related to genetic conditions. Therefore, if someone in your family has the disease, family members should screen for the risk of this disease. Watch for changes in your body, including signs of low blood sugar. Although it cannot prevent the development of endocrine pancreatic tumors, it can reduce the negative health effects.
subsection_title: insulinoma.json. Prevention of pancreatic endocrine insulinoma
